name: efcore-migration-script-generator-task
friendlyName: Entity Framework Core Migrations Script Generator
description: Tool for projects that is using Code-First with Entity Framework Core. Generate migrations scripts that to be used to update an database (for instance with the task 'Azure SQL Database Deployment').
author: PEK's Productions

inputs.name: projectpath
inputs.label: Project Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to project (for instance a csproj-file) containing databases contexts.

inputs.name: startupprojectpath
inputs.label: Executable Project Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to an executable project (for instance a csproj-file) that is using the databases contexts. If the database context is defined the same project this setting isn't necessary.

inputs.name: targetfolder
inputs.label: Target Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Where migration scripts should be saved.
